00039 class btQuantizedBvhTree
00040 {

00060         }

00064         void build_tree(GIM_BVH_DATA_ARRAY & primitive_boxes);

00066         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void quantizePoint(
00067                 unsigned short * quantizedpoint, const btVector3 & point) const
00068         {
00069                 bt_quantize_clamp(quantizedpoint,point,m_global_bound.m_min,m_global_bound.m_max,m_bvhQuantization);
00070         }
00071 
00072 
00073         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool testQuantizedBoxOverlapp(
00074                 int node_index,
00075                 unsigned short * quantizedMin,unsigned short * quantizedMax) const
00076         {
00077                 return m_node_array[node_index].testQuantizedBoxOverlapp(quantizedMin,quantizedMax);
00078         }
00079 
00080         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void clearNodes()
00081         {
00082                 m_node_array.clear();
00083                 m_num_nodes = 0;
00084         }
00085 
00087         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE int getNodeCount() const
00088         {
00089                 return m_num_nodes;
00090         }
00091 
00093         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool isLeafNode(int nodeindex) const
00094         {
00095                 return m_node_array[nodeindex].isLeafNode();
00096         }
00097

00099         {
00100                 return m_node_array[nodeindex].getDataIndex();
00101         }
00102 
00103         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void getNodeBound(int nodeindex, btAABB & bound) const
00104         {
00105                 bound.m_min = bt_unquantize(
00106                         m_node_array[nodeindex].m_quantizedAabbMin,
00107                         m_global_bound.m_min,m_bvhQuantization);
00108 
00109                 bound.m_max = bt_unquantize(
00110                         m_node_array[nodeindex].m_quantizedAabbMax,
00111                         m_global_bound.m_min,m_bvhQuantization);
00112         }
00113 
00114         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void setNodeBound(int nodeindex, const btAABB & bound)
00115         {
00116                 bt_quantize_clamp(      m_node_array[nodeindex].m_quantizedAabbMin,
00117                                                         bound.m_min,
00118                                                         m_global_bound.m_min,
00119                                                         m_global_bound.m_max,
00120                                                         m_bvhQuantization);
00121 
00122                 bt_quantize_clamp(      m_node_array[nodeindex].m_quantizedAabbMax,
00123                                                         bound.m_max,
00124                                                         m_global_bound.m_min,
00125                                                         m_global_bound.m_max,
00126                                                         m_bvhQuantization);
00127         }
00128 
00129         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE int getLeftNode(int nodeindex) const
00130         {
00131                 return nodeindex+1;
00132         }
00133 
00134         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE int getRightNode(int nodeindex) const
00135         {
00136                 if(m_node_array[nodeindex+1].isLeafNode()) return nodeindex+2;
00137                 return nodeindex+1 + m_node_array[nodeindex+1].getEscapeIndex();
00138         }
00139 
00140         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE int getEscapeNodeIndex(int nodeindex) const
00141         {
00142                 return m_node_array[nodeindex].getEscapeIndex();
00143         }
00144 
00145         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE const BT_QUANTIZED_BVH_NODE * get_node_pointer(int index = 0) const
00146         {
00147                 return &m_node_array[index];
00148         }
